data.comment: The match has started.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 1, Kawasaki's Kaoru Mitoma has run offside.
Goal! Yokohama Marinos have got their heads in front thanks to a Marcos Junior strike.
That's a fine assist from Eitaro Matsuda.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In the minute 6, Kawasaki advance rapidly upfield but Masaaki Iemoto blows for offside.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Nissan Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos push forward at Nissan Stadium and Marcos Junior gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kawasaki defence.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Masaaki Iemoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 10, Masaaki Iemoto signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
Kawasaki drive upfield and Leandro Damiao gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 18, Kawasaki's Shintaro Kurumaya has been booked in Yokohama.
In Yokohama, Jun Amano of Yokohama Marinos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Masaaki Iemoto awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Masaaki Iemoto blows against Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos for offside.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Kawasaki's Ryota Ohshima gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Junior Santos for Yokohama Marinos who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Important block from the Yokohama Marinos defence as Leandro Damiao fires in a strike for Kawasaki.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In the minute 31, Kawasaki's Miki Yamane breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Junior Santos for Yokohama Marinos is back on the field again.
In the minute 32, Akihiro Ienaga for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Goal! Kaoru Mitoma levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 33, Yasuto Wakizaka with an assist there.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 37, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 41, Masaaki Iemoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Yokohama.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
In the minute 44, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Jun Amano for Yokohama Marinos drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Masaaki Iemoto will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kawasaki defender.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Masaaki Iemoto has blown to start the second-half.
Reo Hatate (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The away team have replaced Leandro Damiao with Yu Kobayashi. This is the second substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
In the minute 46, Reo Hatate is on a sub for Yasuto Wakizaka for Kawasaki.
Kawasaki are whistled for offside.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Goal! Akihiro Ienaga gives Kawasaki a 1-2 lead in Yokohama.
Great play from Ryota Ohshima to set up the goal.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! Kaoru Mitoma extends Kawasaki's lead to 1-3.
Reo Hatate instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 51, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki's Reo Hatate is whistled for offside at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 55, The away team replace Jesiel with Kyohei Noborizato.
In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos attack through Junior Santos. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 57, Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Takuya Kida is replacing Erik for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Teruhito Nakagawa is replacing Eitaro Matsuda for the home team.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 58, Yokohama Marinos make their third substitution with Daizen Maeda replacing Jun Amano.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 61, In Yokohama, Kawasaki push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Nissan Stadium.
Masaaki Iemoto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Kawasaki at Nissan Stadium.
Kawasaki push upfield but Masaaki Iemoto quickly pulls them for offside.
Kawasaki drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 68, Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a fourth substitution, with Ado Onaiwu replacing Junior Santos.
Yokohama Marinos's Daizen Maeda attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Kawasaki's Kaoru Mitoma breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Manabu Saito is replacing Kaoru Mitoma for the away team.
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Shogo Taniguchi's header is off-target for Kawasaki.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kawasaki.
Yokohama Marinos's Teruhito Nakagawa gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Kawasaki are caught offside.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 79, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Yokohama Marinos will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kawasaki.
In the minute 83, Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Masaaki Iemoto awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
The home team replace Takahiro Ogihara with Kota Watanabe.
In the minute 84, Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 87, Manabu Saito (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos attack through Ado Onaiwu. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Toru Oniki is making the team's fifth substitution at Nissan Stadium with Ao Tanaka replacing Ryota Ohshima.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Marcos Junior for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Free kick Kawasaki.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
